author: nancymarinelli
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is for a bug fix in DataFormats/EcalDigi/src/EcalEBPhase2TriggerPrimitiveDigi.cc, specifically in the implementation of setSize method


#### PR validation:

It's been tested with SimCalorimetry/EcalEBTrigPrimProducers/test/testPhase2_15_0_0.py and the result is as expected
title: Nm tp ph2 fix to release in 15 0 0
